text: 1.61 Acres in CHLORIDE Ariona!! Beautiful 360 Views, no flood zone and ready for new ownership. Zoned agricultural/residential with lots of potential. Off grid secluded feel to this lot yet approximately 20 miles from the City of Kingman where you have access to all your shopping, medical, schools etc. You can place your manufactured home, your livestock and all your off-road vehicles, MANY POSSIBILITIES!! You can star gaze at night and enjoy the amazing sunrises every day. This may be the property you've been waiting to become available. Drive by and see for yourself the opportunity in this investment!

Nice acre lot in the historic mining town of Chloride. Not far from the 93 highway. Mountain views, quiet area, approx 20 minutes from Kingman. Enjoy the peace and quiet of this rural area, but within a few minutes of shopping, schools and medical facilities.

Two side by side lots for sale in CHLORIDE ARIZONA! TWO ACRES- TWO PARCELS! This DOUBLE lot boasts beautiful panoramic mountain views throughout and no flood zone on this off-grid property. Plenty of space for the horses and all your off-road vehicles! This can be your new homestead! Mesmerizing sunrises, sunsets and starry night skies every day/ night! Perfect for someone who wants to live remotely away from the next-door neighbor life but not too far from city amenities. Enjoy some peace and tranquility here! Parcel 308-19-103 & 104. Las Vegas is a little over an hour away and Kingman only 30 mins for all your shopping, dining, medical, etc.

Prime 1 acre parcel, close to N Hwy 93 and approximately 600 feet from Chloride Road. When you see the red metal barn on Chloride Road and Longhorn Drive, turn right. Lot is the 3rd lot on your right.

1.00 ACRE lot in the LAKE MOHAVE VISTA ESTATES! Very CLOSE TO PAVED road access just off Chloride Rd and highway 93!! There's plenty of space for you and all your off-road vehicles with an acre! You can fully fence in this parcel and make it your own, already partial fenced by neighbor! Property nests within the panoramic mountain views of Chloride, sweet privacy & stargaze at night right from your property! Zoned agricultural -residential and has the perfect wild west desert seclusion but not too far from the city for all your shopping and essential needs. Low annual taxes to own this property for investment, 2025 tax records just under $30 a year!! Minutes from paved road making it convenient for your vehicle!! Come walk this lot and see the potential, awaiting your footsteps! Chloride is conveniently only 25 minutes from Kingman.

text: ***UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY! *** Discover 1 acre of prime land with sweeping views, tucked away in a private, low-traffic area, the perfect place to escape and unwind. Stop searching! This is the one! This exceptional property is a blank canvas ready for your vision, offering endless possibilities. Opportunities like this don't come around often, so don't miss your chance to own a true piece of desert paradise. Located in Chloride, a charming historic silver mining town known for its friendly community and rich character, this property blends small town charm with modern convenience. Just a short drive from Las Vegas, Laughlin, and Kingman, you'll enjoy easy access while staying far from the noise and congestion of city life. Experience crystal clear, star filled night skies, peaceful desert surroundings, and scenic landscapes dotted with iconic Joshua trees. Whether you're dreaming of a weekend getaway, full-time residence, or smart investment, this property offers an incredible chance to own a slice of Arizona's breathtaking natural beauty.
2 lots side by side in the great area of Chloride Arizona. Make this area your new home. Close to Kingman but not too close.
Unaffixed mobile home - seller does not have title to the mobile home. REO property; sold as-is. Great opportunity for premium lot in Chloride

LOCATED JUST OUTSIDE OF THE HISTORIC MINING TOWN OF CHLORIDE, ARIZONA! Off-Grid Living with Stunning 360-degree Mountain Views. Land, Cabin, and Travel Trailer Included! Escape the hustle of city life and embrace peaceful desert living with this unique 1.00-acre corner lot offering breathtaking panoramic mountain views and a fully equipped off-grid setup. Whether you're a snowbird, vacationer, or off-grid enthusiast, this property delivers the freedom, comfort, and self-sufficiency you've been looking for. Property Features: 1.00-acre corner lot with expansive views and easy access just off Hwy 93 and Chloride Rd., 2BR septic system, 2,500-gallon water storage tank with water delivery service available, 12 volt, 2000 watt solar power system with backup generator, freshly painted 8x12 tool shed with loft for extra storage, 12x20 cabin with loft, electric, and evaporative cooler, that just needs some finishing touches, charming outdoor kitchen/bar/covered patio perfect for open-air dining and entertaining. MOVE IN READY TRAVEL TRAILER Included: 1994 Forest River 28 ft. travel trailer with 1 slide-out, fully functional and in great working order! This is the perfect opportunity to live off-grid and enjoy a peaceful retreat with everything already in place. Whether you're looking to escape for the weekend or settle into a simpler lifestyle, this property has it all. Lots of trails for horseback riding, hiking and off-roading, the Colorado River, Lake Mohave and Lake Mead are all easy drives from the property. Come and enjoy exploring our beautiful Arizona desert, beautiful sunrises, sunsets and starry night skies. Conveniently located just 30 minutes from Kingman for shopping, medical, dining, etc. and just a little over an hour to Las Vegas, Nv. the entertainment capital of the world. Don't wait, call a Realtor and schedule your personal showing today.

Two separate parcels located along the same street in Chloride, Arizona, totaling approximately 0.47 acres. Parcel numbers #308-06-270 and APN #308-06-272, these lots offer level terrain with accessible roads and electric available nearby. Nestled near the edge of BLM government land, the setting provides a sense of open space and privacy while still being part of the historic Chloride community. Both lots are situated in an area known for its quiet surroundings, scenic desert views, and mild elevation. No homeowner's association and no covenants/restrictions!! With low annual property taxes and no HOA, the holding costs remain minimal, making these parcels a practical option for long-term investment or future use. Chloride Water is available for connection approximately $1, 250 per lot for the water meter and account set up fees- buyer can verify with the local water company for details. These lots may be what you've been waiting to become available. You can drive by and see for yourself the potential! Las Vegas is a little over an hour away for all your major shopping and entertainment and Kingman is less than 30 minutes away.
formatted_address: 2 Lots W Minnesota Avenue, Chloride, AZ, 86431

text: Owner will consider NOTHING DOWN or carryback. (See Docs Tab) Excellent remote, off-grid parcel located in the Cerbat Mountains. This land is in the heart of the 83,000 acre Cerbat Horse Area (one of only 2 in AZ) and abuts BLM land. This is an ideal dark sky location with plenty of wildlife. This is ideal for a true sportsman! Az Game & Fish says Hunting game includes: Antelope, Elk, Bighorn Sheep, Mountain Lion, Mule Deer, Dove, Quail! The Parcel Corners are approximately: NEC: 35.490954, -114.169633, NWC: 35.490982, -114.174074, SWC: 35.487357, -114.174074, and SEC: 35.487348, -114.169633; and the center is, 35.489144 -114.171833. The parcel ranges from ~5,200 to ~6,000 ft in elevation. Listing agent is related to the selling entity. See Docs Tab for additional Hunting Info.

Historic Charm Meets Desert Adventure. Step into a piece of Arizona history with this cozy 1926-built home, nestled in the heart of Chloride the state's oldest continuously inhabited mining town. Surrounded by the breathtaking Cerbat Mountain ranges and desert vistas, this property offers a rare blend of charm and tranquility. Featuring 2 bedrooms and 1 bath, with potential to add a second bathroom in the primary suite, this home retains its original wood floors and a wood-burning stove perfect for those crisp winter nights. The metal corrugated roof adds rustic appeal, while the fully fenced 0.49-acre lot provides space to roam, garden, or simply enjoy the peaceful surroundings. Whether you're seeking a year-round residence, a weekend retreat, or a unique short-term rental opportunity, this historic gem offers endless possibilities in a truly one-of-a-kind setting. The area offers many hiking and riding tails along with water adventures like kayaking, fishing, and boating on the Colorado River, it's the perfect launchpad for desert living with a splash of recreation. Septic replaced approx. 10 years ago, Water source: City Water.

Improved Price! Priced to Sell! Welcome to 5031 W Tennessee Ave nestled in the historic mining town of Chloride, Arizona! This expansive 10-acre estate boasts contoured acreage, primed for diverse opportunity. Whether you envision a farm, a home for horses, additional structures or an entertainment haven- the possibilities are endless. This property showcases a custom 2014 Southwestern Territorial build stretching 1,706 square feet of comfortable living space. Outside, you will discover a charming 340 square-foot Guest Quarters ready for plumbing installation, a detached 19X24 metal roof garage/workshop with an attached 7X17 interior storage room, single carport, fenced in garden beds, pump house that doubles as garden storage space, RV parking with a 20 amp hookup, plus a detached private bathroom with walk-in shower and laundry room. Alongside the home, a 10X60 private fenced in yard perfect for pets. Fully fenced in 2 acres with 4 gate entries and plenty of space for development opportunities. This immaculate home highlights an open living concept including 3 bed, 2 bath, central cooling/heating, wood burning fireplace and a water filtration system with reverse osmosis. Enjoy the spacious casual living room offering plenty of natural light, a stunning wood kitchen displaying solid countertops, soft close custom cabinets, an island, walk-in pantry, casual dining area, 36-inch doorways and a spacious hallway for wheel chair accessibility! Built with energy efficiency in mind, the home is double insulated and equipped with energy-efficient appliances, offering low utility costs. Water conservation features include a rainwater collection system with a 400-gallon cistern for irrigation and water catchment swells throughout the lower areas of the property nourishing vegetation and an array of trees including Chinese Jujube, Apple, Cherry, Apricot and Afghan Pines! Ample space for additional gardening making this your perfect desert paradise! Located against the Cerbat Mountains, you will find sensational views with elevations ranging between 4,000-6,000 feet! This property benefits from it's own private water well with a 550 gallon storage tank and the option to set up water servicing through the local water company. Chloride is 25 miles from Kingman, 40 miles from Bullhead City/Laughlin and 90 miles from Las Vegas!

Own your own piece of history in Historic Chloride, Arizona! This charming 1-bedroom, 1-bath home, built in 1916, is nestled in the heart of the historic mining town of Chloride and is full of unique character and timeless appeal. Situated on a fenced 0.45-acre lot, the property offers multiple outdoor living spaces, including a covered front patio, back deck, side patio, and a greenhouse-perfect for those who enjoy gardening and the outdoors. The property features a detached garage, a shop with basement, and plenty of room to enjoy the peaceful desert setting. Inside, the home showcases, fun wall colors that enhance its historic charm, along with a spacious living room, a dining room highlighted by a chandelier, and a light-filled kitchen complete with a garden window above the sink. The bedroom opens to a large sunroom with abundant windows, allowing natural light to pour in. Additional interior features include indoor laundry with cabinet and counter space and an extra room off the laundry area-ideal for an office, den, craft room, or sewing room. The full bathroom includes a tub/shower combination. Enjoy a peaceful small-town lifestyle, a mild climate, relaxing mornings, and quiet evenings under the stars. This one-of-a-kind historic home is perfect for anyone seeking character, space, and serenity in a truly unique Arizona setting. Whether you're looking for a full-time residence, a peaceful desert retreat, or a charming weekend getaway, this unique property checks all the boxes. Come and explore our beautiful Arizona desert, beautiful sunrises, sunsets and starry night skies. Don't wait, opportunity is knocking, call a Realtor and schedule your personal tour of this home today.

Charming Mountain Retreat perched atop a scenic hill with sweeping views of the historic mining town of Chloride, this darling mountain-style home blends comfort, character, and wide-open space. The main level features a welcoming master suite, a bright open and functional kitchen, cozy living area, and a guest half bath. Upstairs, two additional bedrooms, with a full bath. The spacious open loft area offers incredible panoramic views perfect for lounging, gaming, or creating your ideal home office. Warm pine ceilings and trim run throughout the home, adding rustic charm and a true mountain-home feel. An attached 1 car garage and spacious laundry room is 15 x 21 plus a 16 x 25 detached garage and a 2 car covered carport with an attached enclosed workshop, plus RV hook up! Plenty of room to expand, store recreational toys, have farm animals or simply enjoy the peaceful surroundings. Acreage includes parcel 308-06-532 containing .18 acres. Please do not disturb the seller with an agent.

Don t miss out on this rare opportunity to own a piece of Chloride s charm. Act now and start your journey in this sun-soaked paradise! Manufactured home & agriculturally zoned.

Welcome to 7729 W Sanctuary Rd in Chloride, Arizona! This expansive 5-acre estate is perfectly positioned at the intersection of US Highway 93 and W Sanctuary Rd, offering breathtaking panoramic mountain views and vast, undeveloped land. Zoned AR/5A with No HOA, No Restrictions and Low Taxes, this property presents a rare opportunity for both recreation and development. It features an existing SEPTIC SYSTEM, a concrete propane pad and water haul access, providing a solid foundation for your development plans. Strategically located, this property offers convenient access to all major cities! 26 miles to Kingman, 80 miles to Las Vegas and Lake Havasu, 40 miles to Bullhead City and Laughlin. Additionally, there is potential for a possible commercial conversion adding even more value to this investment. Water wells in the area are estimated at approximately 450 feet deep. For inquiries, reach out to your local realtor today!
